mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sweepter, Vol. 2, No. 30, Novemember 17th, 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Sweeper was published weekly for the welfare and recreation of Naval personnel serving in the Mine Force Command. It was printed in conformance to NAVEXOS P-35, Appendix B, revised November 1945, at no cost to the government. The Sweeper was a member of the Armed Forces Press Service (AFPS).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia
Newspapers
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
